doc:
Harvey Stephens https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harvey_Stephens 0 Harvey Stephens (August 21, 1901 – December 22, 1986) was an American actor, known initially for his performances in Broadway productions, and thereafter for his work in film and on television. He was most active in film beginning in the 1930s and through the mid-1940s. Beginning in the mid-1950s, he transitioned to television and enjoyed success there through the 1960s. Stephens was also an avid competitive glider pilot. He was inducted into the Soaring Hall of Fame in 1966 for his contributions to the sport. Harvey_Stephens ( August_21_,_1901 – December_22_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor , known initially for his_performances in Broadway_productions , and thereafter for his_work in film and on television . He was most_active in film_beginning in the_1930s and through the_mid-1940s . Beginning in the_mid-1950s , he transitioned to television_and_enjoyed_success there through the_1960s . Stephens was also an_avid_competitive_glider_pilot . He was_inducted into the_Soaring_Hall of Fame in 1966 for his_contributions to the_sport .
